bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h5>System information (version)</denchmark-h>
OpenCV => 3.3.0-rc Operating System / Platform => ubuntu16.04 Compiler => ‚ùî
<denchmark-h:h5>Detailed description</denchmark-h>
dnn::tutorials some files not found at tutorial_dnn_googlenet these files are not found caffe_googlenet.cpp bvlc_googlenet.prototxt synset_words.txt. <denchmark-h:h5>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
open this page <denchmark-link:https://github.com/opencv/opencv/blob/3.3.0-rc/modules/dnn/tutorials/tutorial_dnn_googlenet.markdown>https://github.com/opencv/opencv/blob/3.3.0-rc/modules/dnn/tutorials/tutorial_dnn_googlenet.markdown</denchmark-link>
click these links that can be downloaded "here". download GoogLeNet model files: "bvlc_googlenet.prototxt" classes: "synset_words.txt".
